title.narrative: FINANCIAL RESOURCES AND STEWARDSHIP

description.narrative: Stewardship of Financial resources creates the conditions to pursue Country Operations., which contributes to Field Office Oversight, Management And Operations Support, Field/Country Office Oversight, Management And Operations Support. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Operational support to programme activities implementation: The Country Office regularly updated and implemented the risk management framework within its management plan, and pursued measures to ensure financial accountability, effective internal controls, cost savings and efficiencies, workforce diversity, and preparedness for contingency scenarios with emphasis on information and communications technology.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Stewardship of Financial resources creates the conditions to pursue Country Operations.

description.narrative: Congo CO has improved most financial KPIs and met UNICEF standards during the year. In line with KRC 10, the office has ensured the implementation of Dual Internet Links with costs reduction. | Status:Met | As-of Date:23/01/2020

title.narrative: DCT over 9 moths should be monitorred monthly(43105)
GIT are regularly monitorred and no GIT pending over 6 months for the office action(43113)
Inventory ageing is maintained between the recommended scheduled and no ageing over the recommended scheduled of 3 months to 2 years(43112)
PAR account are regularly monitorred closely and all open items should be less than 365 days(43108)
Supply Plan for the year is in place is regularly monitorred(43111)
GR/IR should be clear and no pendig over 30 days(43116)
Utilization rate of grants that expired during the year(38675)
TA should not be open over 15 days(43106)
Supply unit ensures that recurrent purchase of good and services are don through LTA(43107)
Account payable should be monitorred and no account payable should be over 180 days(43115)
